g.text: text=The smart watch should tell the user the
time and allow the user to excecute, install or
uninstall widgets which can make use of it's
text=The watch shall display the current
time when the screen is not asleep and
when the screen is not displaying
text=Screen should be asleep to save
battery and it can be turned on by tapping
the touch screen, pressing the side button
or detecting a rotation to check the watch
text=The GPS sensor shall allow widgets
to retrieve the location coordinates and
widgets to detect sudden movements and
the movement direction on a vector form.
widgets to detect device rotation and
provide it's direction on a vector form.
